summary: From 'The First Avenger' To 'Endgame': Tracking The Tesseract's Whereabouts In The MCU
title: From 'The First Avenger' To 'Endgame': Tracking The Tesseract's Whereabouts In The MCU
body:
From ‘The First Avenger’ To ‘Endgame’: Tracking The Tesseract’s Whereabouts In The MCU

*THE FOLLOWING POST CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR CAPTAIN MARVEL 

Captain Marvellanded in theaters this past weekend and in a big bad way. The film was received well critically and judging by the numbers, audiences seem to dig it too. And why not? It’s flashy, often exciting and consistently funny. It also boasts a couple big reveals, chief among them being the Tesseract as the source of Carol Danvers’…

summary: When Carol Meets Steve: A Tale of Two Marvel Captains
title: When Carol Meets Steve: A Tale of Two Marvel Captains
excerpt: With Chris Evans stepping away from The Avengers, Brie Larson is positioned as the perfect replacement leader.
description:
“I am certain that a leader is required for The Avengers heading into Phase 4 and beyond. Neither Buck or Sam can really fill that role. Not yet and maybe not ever. If Marvel Studios takes either of those characters in that direction, their narrative will involve the struggle to earn those stars and stripes. Carol Danvers, on the other hand, is a natural fit.

Yes, both Carol and Steve come from military backgrounds. However, we should recognize their determination to serve as more valuable than their actual service. They answered the call to be the best they could be, but then they were denied by the institutions speaking. Steve was a scrawny little weakling and an embarrassment to every soldier that put their eyes upon him. Carol was a woman. How dare she. Steve found his loophole by sacrificing his body to science, and Carol had to settle for the role of guinea pig test pilot. Their defiance rewarded in true superhero fashion, and no one can ever deny their will again.

They make their way onto the battlefield and are only accepted after they sacrifice everything they have to offer. Resurrected as demigods, they can now serve the weak using only their moral compasses to guide them. They don’t need orders; they give them.”

summary: Hello! Steve and Nat have an awesome friendship built from trust and acceptance. I noticed in IW they are simply in sync with...
question: Hello! Steve and Nat have an awesome friendship built from trust and acceptance. I noticed in IW they are simply in sync with each other, obviously in tune with the other. Do you think they could start a romantic relationship in Endgame? I couldn't help but notice that Nat didn't seem all too warm to Bruce in their reunion. In fact, they panned the camera to Steve and Natasha, making it seem like there might be something there? It almost looked like a love triangle? What are your predictions?
answer:
Hi, anon! Thank you for your interest in reading my theories ^^

I agree with you completely. I even wrote lengthy meta posts about them (which you can find here, here and here).

I see two reasons for all this:

1/ Romanogers has been hinted at — subtly enough not to interfere with the events of IW or spoil Endgame but visible enough not to look like their relationship is coming out of the blue in the final film. Infinity War was very much about making couples canon (ScarletVision and Starmora) and it would seem logical that the Russos would want Romanogers to get the same treatment. Considering they were barely in the movie, it would make sense that they decided to put it off until Endgame. However, it is important to note that the underlying theme for these couples was sacrifice: does it mean Romanogers will get it too? Or is their romance saved for later because their fate diverge from this pattern? Just some food for thought. ^^

 2/ Romanogers is already canon but is and will remain understated. If that is the case, then we can only expect other cinematographic clues and hints like the ones we’ve been getting since CATWS.

Personally, that would leave me hungry for more. And somehow I doubt that the Russo brothers would simply leave it at that after dropping so many hints and developing their relationship across four movies only to keep it implicit in the end. And they did warn that Endgame would be the conclusion of an arc started in CATWS which is very personal to them. I doubt it would be something related to Bucky (his arc has been concluded) or to SHIELD. The only thing left that I can think of is Romanogers — and the clues dropped in IW seem to support that.

As for the love triangle, I don’t think they will go there. The impression I got from the reunion scene in IW is that Romanogers has taken over, hence why Steve also appears in the shot. So when Bruce greets Natasha, Steve is very close by as a hint that the context has changed. 

I would love to know what you think, anon. Feel free to drop another ask or even a DM.

summary: Joe Russo to visit India ahead of 'Avengers: EndGame' release
title: Joe Russo to visit India ahead of 'Avengers: EndGame' release
excerpt: All the Marvel fans have a reason to rejoice as they’ll soon be able to interact with one of the two famed Russo brothers- Joe Russo, who is all set to visit India in April ahead of the release of ‘Avengers: Endgame’.

summary: Tom Holland da Spider-Man a Cherry
title: Tom Holland da Spider-Man a Cherry
body:
Going News | 12 marzo 2019 | cinema | di JCR | Riproduzione riservata

L'attore è in trattative per recitare un'altra volta con i fratelli Russo, che lo hanno diretto in Avengers: Endgame

[Facebook - Tom Holland]


Cherry è il nuovo film su cui sono attualmente concentrati di fratelli Anthony e Joe Russo, che potrebbe essere interpretato da Tom Holland, che per loro ha recitato nel ruolo di Spider-Man nell'imminente Avengers: Endgame. Secondo il sito web del magazine Variety, il giovane attore sarebbe in trattative per ottenere una parte di rilievo nel progetto.


Cherry, che ha una sceneggiatura di Jessica Goldberg, che ha adattato il romanzo Exit West di Nico Walker, si concentra sulla vera storia dell'autore, un ex medico dell'esercito tornato dall'Iraq con il disturbo da stress post-traumatico, non diagnosticato. Con una dipendenza da oppiacei, e rapinatore di banche, Walker è stato catturato e condannato nel 2011. Il è atteso per il 2020.


Avengers: Endgame verrà distribuito in Italia il prossimo 24 aprile. Tom Holland ha recitato anche in Spider-Man: Far from Home, che nei cinema italiani esordirà il 4 luglio. Prossimamente, potrà essere visto anche in Chaos Walking.

summary: Theaters Are Beginning to Enter Showtimes for Avengers: Endgame
title: Theaters Are Beginning to Enter Showtimes for Avengers: Endgame
body:
Theaters Are Beginning to Enter Showtimes for #AvengersEndgame

Aside from the date for the new trailer, the thing people are most curious about regarding Avengers: Endgame is when advanced tickets will go on sale.

While a leak on Reddit a few weeks ago showed an April 2nd date, there are signs that it could possibly be sooner than that. Theaters are beginning to enter showtimes for the movie into their system already, such as these two Regal theaters in…

summary:
Carol, turning up at the avengers compound in endgame: uh, hi. I’m fury’s emergency contact. 
Steve: great, so you’re here to...
body:
Carol, turning up at the avengers compound in endgame: uh, hi. I’m fury’s emergency contact.

Steve: great, so you’re here to help us save the world?

Carol: no, I’m here to remove myself as fury’s emergency contact.

Steve: …

Nat: …

Bruce: …

Carol, cracking up: nah, I’m just fuckin with you. now whose ass am I kicking today?
